duties_responsibilities.duty: Reconcile domestic bank accounts and resolve variances in a timely manner.
Monitor, evaluate, and report on foreign cash repatriation, controls, exposure, and exchange.
Track monthly workers' compensation claims, record claim adjustments, and analyze P&L impact per plant.
Record and reconcile monthly cost allocations from Amsted, and obtain supporting documentation of ad hoc charges.
Perform various month-end closing duties, including manual journal entries, reconciling GL accounts, and preparation and distribution of various reports.
Compile government reports by coordinating with various functional departments and foreign locations.
Compile and review consolidated year-end standards for Amsted.
Lead coordinator of BAC insurance with Amsted, including utilization of their insurance software for annual policy renewals.
Coordinate with foreign BAC entities to obtain necessary documentation related to foreign insurance renewals.
Assist in SOX testing in the areas of Fixed Assets, Management Reporting, Revenue, Procurement & Operations.
Assist in ad hoc process improvements and special projects as needed.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s Degree in Accounting or Finance (SAP ERP knowledge preferable)
